name: Rocket Core
description:
You are on an epic quest to find the lost riches left scattered across a distant planet. However, those riches were intended to be left alone. Don your trusty jetpack, draw your pistol, and dodge endless traps of death strewn across this terrible place!

This is a beta copy of Rocket Core, with 15 levels across various terrains to give you an idea of what the final version will be like. We are currently in the middle of our Steam Greenlight campaign, and would love for you to vote yes if you enjoyed it:

Click here to visit the Greenlight page


In the beta, only keyboard is supported, gamepad support will be added to the full version. Default controls are: (these can be remapped in the options menu)

  • Move left/right: Left/right arrowkeys
  • Fly: Shift
  • Jump: Z
  • Shoot: CTRL


The full version is planned for Summer 2017 release and will contain:

  • 100 levels, progressively harder with new enemies, traps, & hazards introduced along the way
  • Chiptune soundtrack
  • Level editor - create and release your own levels and packs for others to play
  • Unlockables that modify the game to give it a new playing experience


Thank you for checking it out! We love to hear feedback, hit us up here, on Twitter (@mdntmstdns) or email (midnightmastodons@gmail.com)
